## About framework

This is a nestjs project version 11.x.

## Coding guidelines

When generating code, please follow these guidelines:

- Use TypeScript and follow NestJS best practices.
- Considering using Domain-Driven Design (DDD) principles.

## Domain Driven Design (DDD)

- Structure the project into modules representing different domains.
- Inside each module, separate code into layers: Domain, Application and infraestructure.

## Testing

- Write unit tests for services, controllers, and other components using Jest.
- Ensure using nestjs testing utilities for better integration with the framework.
